thread.title: ezPaycheck Payroll Software Is Updated For Customers Who Want To Ditch Expensive Outsourcing Companies
thread.title_full: ezPaycheck Payroll Software Is Updated For Customers Who Want To Ditch Expensive Outsourcing Companies

author: Tammie Bernard
title: ezPaycheck Payroll Software Is Updated For Customers Who Want To Ditch Expensive Outsourcing Companies
text:
The latest ezPaycheck payroll software from Halfpricesoft.com is bringing payroll back in-house and allowing potential customers to ditch their current outsourcing companies. When utilizing ezPaycheck software, customers are learning the ins and outs of processing payroll forms and reports in-house without the hassles of extended learning curves. Business owners now can download and start printing payroll and miscellaneous checks in the same day. "Ditch the expensive payroll outsource companies and process payroll in-house for less money and less stress with the updated ezPaycheck payroll software," explains Dr. Ge, President and Founder of Halfpricesoft.com
The US has close to 6 million small employers, 90% of which employs fewer than 20 people with no accountant on staff. Designed with simplicity in mind, the new improved ezPaycheck payroll software user interface is easy-to-use and straightforward for small business customers who are ready to ditch expensive outsource companies.
EzPaycheck software is designed to automate paycheck processes to reduce the time spent on running payroll. The software's graphical interface gives customers step-by-step instructions on how to setup employee information, importing data, calculating payroll - including calculation of federal, state and local taxes; deductions for Medicare; insurance and 401(k) plans; and printing paychecks. New users can download and try this software for free with no obligation and no cost at http://www.halfpricesoft.com/payroll_software_download.asp
Below is a list of features included in ezPaycheck payroll software:
Supports both blank computer checks or preprinted checks Automatically calculates Federal Withholding Tax, Social Security, Medicare and Employer Unemployment Taxes
Includes built-in tax tables for all 50 states and the District of Columbia
Creates and maintains payroll for multiple companies, and does it simultaneously
Prints Tax Forms 940, 941, W-2 and W-3
Supports unlimited accounts at no additional charge
Supports network for multiple users
Offers no cost live chat, email, and remote access for customer support
Supports differential pay rates within the company
Supports daily, weekly, biweekly, semimonthly and monthly pay periods
 Features report functions, print functions, and pay stub functions
Supports both miscellaneous checks and payroll calculation checks
To start the 30-day test drive, visit the site at: http://www.halfpricesoft.com/index.asp
About Halfpricesoft.com
Halfpricesoft.com is a leading provider of small business software, including payroll software, employee attendance tracking software, accounting software, check printing software, W2 software, 1099 software, and ezACH direct deposit software. Software from Halfpricesoft.com is trusted by thousands of customers and will assist small business owners in simplifying payroll processing and business management. Visit http://www.halfpricesoft.com/index.asp for details and download.
